shortdesc.p: These instructions will teach you how to cook delicious breakfast meals!
These instructions will teach you how to make a delicious breakfast omelette to keep you going throughout your day!
These are instructions to make a quick and easy, but delicious and fluffy breakfast pancake!

topic.title: How to make a Breakfast Sandwich

shortdesc.p: These instructions will show you how to make a delicious breakfast sandwich that'll keep you full in the morning
This recipe will allow you to make a delicious smoothie to start your day off right!
These instructions will show you how to make a more complex yet delicious breakfast yogurt

topic.title: How to Properly and Thoroughly Clean the Kitchen

shortdesc.p: These instructions will teach you how to clean dishes, tabletops, tools, and also teach you what materials to clean them with
